caption.p: Effects of A. muricata and C. trifoliatum extracts on adhesion of A. triangularis WU19001 trophozoites at 24 h. The cells were grown in PYG medium, and treated with the agents at different concentrations, incubated for 24 h. Chlorhexidine and 1% DMSO was included as positive and negative control, respectively. Images of the adhesion were observed by inverted microscope (200X).
